abstract: The finding of the wreckage of the HMS Victory, a legendary British warship, will be featured on the Discovery Channel program “Treasure Quest” on Thursday.
snippet: The finding of the wreckage of the HMS Victory, a legendary British warship, will be featured on the Discovery Channel program “Treasure Quest” on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Discovery announces underwater discovery | The finding of the wreckage of the H.M.S. Victory, a legendary British warship, will be featured on the Discovery Channel program “Treasure Quest” on Thursday. The cable channel held a press conference about the underwater discovery in London on Monday, reports William J. Broad of The New York Times. The weekly “Treasure Quest” series had its debut last month. (2/2, 1:35 p.m.)
